content:
Hi my name is Alexandra Sanchez (my kerb is alexsanc) and I only just registered for this class 9/15. As a result I missed PS0, Lec1 Finger exercise, and Lec2 Finger exercise. Also, I am not added as a student on the course website yet, so I am currently unable to complete the Lec3 finger exercise that is due tomorrow. Just wondering what I should do to correct my missing work.

Please let me know! Thank you.
subject: Late registration logisitcs - missing work

content:
Hello, I approved your add into 6.100L. Our class website is here:  https://sicp-s1.mit.edu/6.100L_fa22 

1. Please read the course info and the announcements.
2. Look through the slides for the lectures up to today.
3. I gave you an extension on the first 2 finger exercise until 3pm tomorrow. The third is due tomorrow at 3pm as well.
4. You missed 1 quiz so far. We do not give extensions for late adds, but do allow you to drop the lowest 3 quiz scores out of 10.  
5. Our optional recitation is Fridays at 10am in 37-212
